login-sub-heading: Access to review your Hayya details.
login-description: If you have registered previously using another method please create a new Hayya account using the same email address to retrieve your data
register-sub-heading: Let's get your Account created, so you can access the Hayya services!
register-term-agree: I have read and accepted the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
verify-email-address-desc: The verification code has been sent to your inbox. Please copy it to the input box.
have-you-receive-code: Have you not received the code?
setup-your-password-desc: E-mail address verified. Please set up a password for your Hayya account
account-created-success-desc: You can now apply for an Entry Permit or review your activities.
exit-message-modal: Are you sure you want to leave the registration process? In this case, all progress will be lost and you will be required to register again.
